foreignData.name: Kathedralenmembran
foreignData.text:
({W/P} kann entweder mit {W} oder 2 Lebenspunkten bezahlt werden.)
Verteidiger
Wenn die Kathedralenmembran während eines Kampfes aus dem Spiel auf einen Friedhof gelegt wird, fügt sie jeder Kreatur, die sie in diesem Kampf geblockt hat, 6 Schadenspunkte zu.

foreignData.name: Membrana de la catedral
foreignData.text:
({W/P} puede pagarse con {W} o con 2 vidas.)
Defensor.
Cuando la Membrana de la catedral vaya a un cementerio desde el campo de batalla durante el combate, hace 6 puntos de daño a cada criatura a la que bloqueó este combate.

foreignData.name: Cathédrale membranée
foreignData.text:
({W/P} peut être payé au choix avec {W} ou 2 points de vie.)
Défenseur
Quand la Cathédrale membranée est mise dans un cimetière depuis le champ de bataille pendant le combat, elle inflige 6 blessures à chaque créature qu'elle a bloquée ce combat-ci.

foreignData.name: Membrana della Cattedrale
foreignData.text:
({W/P} può essere pagato con {W} o con 2 punti vita.)
Difensore
Quando la Membrana della Cattedrale viene messa in un cimitero dal campo di battaglia durante il combattimento, infligge 6 danni a ogni creatura da lei bloccata in questo combattimento.

foreignData.name: 大聖堂の皮膜
foreignData.text:
（{W/P}は{W}でも２点のライフでも支払うことができる。）
防衛
大聖堂の皮膜が戦闘中に戦場からいずれかの墓地に置かれたとき、それはこの戦闘でそれがブロックしていた各クリーチャーにそれぞれ６点のダメージを与える。
foreignData.type: アーティファクト・クリーチャー — 壁

foreignData.name: Membrana da Catedral
foreignData.text:
({W/P} pode ser pago com {W} ou 2 pontos de vida.)
Defensor
Quando Membrana da Catedral é colocada num cemitério vinda do campo de batalha durante o combate, ela causa 6 pontos de dano a cada criatura que ela bloqueou neste combate.

foreignData.name: Соборная Мембрана
foreignData.text:
(За {W/P} можно заплатить либо {W}, либо 2 жизни.)
Защитник
Когда Соборная Мембрана попадает с поля битвы на кладбище во время боя, она наносит 6 повреждений каждому существу, которое она блокировала в этом бою.

foreignData.name: 圣堂护层
foreignData.text:
（{W/P}可用{W}或2点生命来支付。）
守军
当圣堂护层于战斗中从战场置入坟墓场时，它对本次战斗中每个被它阻挡的生物各造成6点伤害。

foreignData.name: 聖堂護層
foreignData.text:
（{W/P}可用{W}或2點生命來支付。）
守軍
當聖堂護層於戰鬥中從戰場置入墳墓場時，它對本次戰鬥中每個被它阻擋的生物各造成6點傷害。

name: Cathedral Membrane
originalText:
({PW} can be paid with either {W} or 2 life.)
Defender
When Cathedral Membrane is put into a graveyard from the battlefield during combat, it deals 6 damage to each creature it blocked this combat.

rulings.text: A card with Phyrexian mana symbols in its mana cost is each color that appears in that mana cost, regardless of how that cost may have been paid.
To calculate the mana value of a card with Phyrexian mana symbols in its cost, count each Phyrexian mana symbol as 1.

As you cast a spell or activate an activated ability with one or more Phyrexian mana symbols in its cost, you choose how to pay for each Phyrexian mana symbol at the same time you would choose modes or choose a value for X.
If you’re at 1 life or less, you can’t pay 2 life.
Phyrexian mana is not a new color. Players can’t add Phyrexian mana to their mana pools.
Cathedral Membrane’s ability will trigger no matter why it’s put into a graveyard during the combat phase, not just because of combat damage.

text:
({W/P} can be paid with either {W} or 2 life.)
Defender
When Cathedral Membrane dies during combat, it deals 6 damage to each creature it blocked this combat.
